wikipedia_page.main: David Richard Dyson (born 27 April 1970) is the former Chief Executive of Three UK, one of 4 mobile networks operating in the UK.

response: * David Dyson, boss of Three UK since June 2011
* David Dyson, Chief Executive since July 2011 of Three UK
